heading: walkman does digital downloads
subheading: sony joins the portable digital music player club with its latest walkman. diamond multimedia upgrades the rio player with more memory.
author: wired news report
text: consumer electronics and media giant sony unveiled its first digital walkman for the japanese market, and is expected to make a similar announcement in the united states. the device, called memory stick walkman, supports sony's proprietary copy protection technology for music called magicgate.read wired news' ongoing mp3 coverage
